title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: A young girl volunteers to participate in a deadly televised competition.

title: Catching Fire
author: Suzanne Collins
description: The sequel to The Hunger Games where Katniss becomes a symbol of rebellion.

title: Mockingjay
author: Suzanne Collins
description: The final installment in the Hunger Games trilogy where Katniss fights the Capitol.

title: Divergent
author: Veronica Roth
description: In a future society, people are divided into factions and a girl discovers she's different.

title: Insurgent
author: Veronica Roth
description: The second book in the Divergent series where Tris fights the controlling system.
